phrases: We had a minor incident toward the end,
but in the end, you won, completely unscathed!
If he had not pulled his punch, I would have...
We now have an announcement for everyone here.
There appear to be monsters outside right now,
so we ask that you do not leave the venue until the police give the all-clear.
We will be safe from the monsters in here.
There is no point in dwelling on it.
I just need to make sure I never see that guy again.
I am just going to take it easy.
They are holding Rosie, Dave, and Bazuzu!
The contestants that were sent to the hospital..
You guys can deal with the monsters!
How far the martial arts world has fallen...
You are all going to become monsters.
Even you trash fighters should be somewhat useful after you become monsters.
We pro heroes will put you in your place!
I am not here to kill you all today.
I am Goketsu, and I am here on behalf of the Monster Association.
You do not mean the previous Super Fight champion?!
If you know who I am, this should not take too long.
You must realize resistance is futile.
But I heard that he was killed by a monster a few years ago!
It is true that I was defeated by a certain monster in the past,
and I was taken to their lair.
But to my surprise, they made me an offer.
In return for my cooperation, they would grant all of my desires!
As a monster, I can surpass the limits I had as a human!
Do you understand what I am saying?
I am on a completely different level than the martial artist Goketsu!
I have something to give you.
Then you can all become monsters.
If you do not eat them, I will just kill you.
Are you just out for murder and destruction?
True, violence is a basic desire for monsters.
But that is not our only motive.
We are trying to go one step higher.
You can just stay there and watch for now,
and observe how physically and mentally weak humans are.
I can feel the power and violence flow through me!
You are going to regret what you did to me during our match!
He is got superhuman strength now.
How interesting that even a peasant like him could gain such power.
I should be able to awaken to the ultimate power,
given I am the man with the world's most perfect genes.
Not only did it improve my physical functioning,
but I can feel my subconscious limits falling away.
So this is how it feels to be a monster?
Now I will definitely be able to kill that guy!
I will make him pay for embarrassing me like that... with his death!
You did not turn out too bad.
We do have winners and losers, depending on what we are working with.
The rest of you filth need to eat those, too.
I feel like I can do anything now!
If I can chase those guys off, will you go on a date with me?
I am going to relieve all that stress from the finals right now.
We actually have someone who dares defy us in this situation?
We are to eliminate anyone who dares to become an enemy of the Monster Association.
You are nothing but a playboy!
You suddenly want to play hero now?
It is just that you guys
Your answer suggests you lack intelligence.
I will remake this world with only those of my own choosing.
And in my eyes, you just failed.
I have not bled in a long time.
This monsterization stuff sure is wild.
You know, it would be a waste to just kill you.
I will still let you change your mind.
The world will eventually belong to the monsters.
That means the strong can go as crazy as they want,
kill all they want, and enjoy true freedom.
It will be a world of blood and violence.
You can live an enjoyable life as a monster.
Not a bad deal, is it?
You are saying it does not matter what the world's like,
as long as you enjoy yourself...
Well, sorry... but the last thing I ever want to be is as ugly as you!
You really are the guardian deity of City Q!
I guess he really is a Class S hero.
Just before I started my hunt, monsters suddenly attacked.
I was amazed at how powerful and fast he was in that battle,
I can deal with him just fine.
Watchdog Man, it is your turn to be hunted!
Are you human, or are you a monster?
Fist of Flowing Water Crushed Rock!
He does have speed and power, if nothing else.
I will give you three seconds.
Keep fighting back, as if your life depends on it!
You can take care of those guys, too.
I will give you three seconds.
He surpasses me in every way...
You get some good grub today.
so when they turned into monsters, they lost their sense of self.
After observing the finals, I have realized that you are stronger than me.
There is no way that I can beat you.
But now, you are on the verge of death.
You may have taken the top position in human society,
but you do not stand a chance against these monsters.
That is why I am asking for your help!
I have made up my mind.
I am going to become a monster, as well.
You can just die right here.
I give up on becoming the world's strongest person.
I will aim to be the ultimate being on the next level!
Jeez, he actually ate all of them.
I will shut that trap of yours myself in a moment.
Looks like your body's not holding up.
You have failed to become a monster.
You are finally the only one left.
There are patients up ahead in the ICU that cannot be moved!
As a hero, I cannot back down!
In the end, heroes are only human.
You are only worth being oppressed by us monsters.
Now you can cry and scream without anyone seeing you.
Now that we are dressed like this, we are the real deal.
This suit is strong against monster claws, fangs, and beaks.
I am also wearing my lightning shoes!
Now we can really show you what we are made of!
We are up against three opponents, though.
Can we leave one of them to you?
Do not try so hard when you are not wearing a tank-top.
Now, let us get out of here.
Why are you taking fighting stances, you two?
You guys do not stand a chance!
I mean, you two were lower than me...
Where do you think you are going?!
I guess this one was a winner after all.
It looks like you are the same threat level as me: Dragon.
You are still trying to stand?
Let the monsters run wild to show the humans how terrifying we are.
That part is going very well.
Everything is enveloped in uneasiness and fear.
Kidnapping someone connected to the Hero Association.
We managed to kidnap the son of one of their executives.
and monsterized a bunch of violent inmates, and is heading back here.
It appears Goketsu has turned some of the martial artists into monsters, as well.
That should also bring us some worthy monsters.
If multiple Class S heroes show up, even you will end up with broken bones.
But I am done here, anyway.
I will take you to our hideout.
Do not you dare order me around!
There are a number of monsters, including me, who are stronger than you.
Do not let your head get too big.
Are the other monsters heading back to the hideout, as well?
That means the heroes, including Class S heroes,
will head toward any remaining monsters.
A simpleton like you would not stand a chance.
I have given you a warning.
That is where you can find us.
There is a ton of monsters.
That guy's punch freaked me out.
Yeah, I am done trying to be the strongest.
I have no intention of fighting anymore.
I have always been a guy who loved hurting those weaker than me!
That is the only reason I wanted to become stronger!
Now that I am free, I feel great!
Wow, the great Suiryu actually screamed in agony.
It is too bad we do not have an audience to witness this.
Youth, talent, popularity, money, women, and freedom.
Do not you think you are a bit greedy to have all of that?
I will let you taste a bit of hell before you die to make up for it!
Is not there anyone who can help me?!
I am being attacked by a monster!
If you can hear me, please come here!
No one's going to hear you.
No heroes are going to come.
No one stands a chance against this guy...
No matter how strong some heroes may be...
When people find themselves in darkness, they seek the light.
It does not matter how faint or small that light is.
As long as it is there, there is hope...
This is what you call despair.
I heard you call for help, Suiryu.
You did well on your own.
